review: From 2017 my father is getting treatment from Dr. Prabhakar. We got appointment through practo and treatment provided with extra care and explained the problem with understandable way. The treatment was satisfied. During last week we again went for check up and doctor  provided medication. In that one medicine is allergic to my father and we have contacted through telephonic consultation and immediately changed the medication and sent the prescription through email. Now my father is feeling better ðŸ˜Š

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Being a good doctor means being incredibly compulsive. It has nothing to do with flights of intuition or brilliant diagnoses or even saving lives. It's dealing with a lot of people with chronic diseases that you really can't change or improve. You can help patients. You can make a difference in their lives, but you do that mostly by drudgeryâ€”day after day, paying attention to details, seeing patient after patient and complaint after complaint, and being responsive on the phone when you don't feel like being responsive
